readable.title: 3175434849_859f09fe07
readable.content: a crowd of people are at a fair in front of booth where giant teddy bears can be won . A picture of a crowd of people and hanging teddy bears at a stand . Large stuffed bears hang above a carnival game . Many people are crowded around a game table with toy bears hanging over it . People at an indoor carnival featuring a game with large stuffed animals as prizes .
